channel.title: datacenter on The B0ardside
channel.description: Recent content in datacenter on The B0ardside

item.title: User Space Networking
item.description: One theme I’ve noticed recently is a move to User Space networking - not for normal application use per se, but for specific high throughput cases, where the kernel’s general network stack’s overhead is too much. This isn’t a new thing, but something I’ve never gotten around to exploring. This vid, from last year, provides an overview of three different implementations..
